CH COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFIC 04/06/06 CASE# 06049528 ORIGINAL OFFENSE REPORT PAGE 3 UPON MAKING CONTACT WITH _______ SHE WAS UNABLE TO STAND STRAIGHT, SLURRED HER SPEECH, AND HAD VERY RESTRICTED PUPILS, HOWEVER, SHE CONTINUALLY STATED THAT SHE WAS NOT UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF ANY DRUG. AT THIS TIME, _______________ WAS PLACED INTO HANDCUFFS, WAS DOUBLELOCKED AND CHECKED FOR TIGHTNESS. I THEN SPOKE WITH _____________, WHO REPORTED THAT SHE SAW _____________ TAKE APPROXIMATELY 2 1/2 KANAX BARS, WHILE PARTYING AT PALM BEACH COUNTRY ESTATES, IN THE EARLY MORNING HOURS OF 033106. _____________ THEN STATED THAT _____________ AND _____________ HAVE BOTH BEEN TO HIGH RIDGE FOR DRUG USE, AND THEY HAVE BOTH BEEN USING NARCOTICS SINCE THE AGE OF 14. _____________ FURTHER EXPRESSED THAT HE NEEDED HELP IN LEARNING HOW TO CONTROL HIS DAUGHTERS. _____________ WAS ISSUED INFORMATION ON THE PALM BEACH COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE YOUTH EAGLE ACADEMY PROGRAM. _____________ COMPLETED A SWORN WITNESS STATEMENT, WHICH WAS SUBMITTED TO THE PALM BEACH COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE. PHOTOGRAPHS OF _____________ WERE NOT TAKEN AS HE HAD NO VISIBLE INJURY. PROBABLE CAUSE SUPPLEMENTAL AND VICTIM NOTIFICATION FORM WERE COMPLETED ON SCENE. _____________ SIGNED FOR AND RECEIVED A COPY OF THE VICTIM'S RIGHTS BROCHURE. _____________ WAS TRANSPORTED TO THE JUVENILE ASSESSMENT CENTER BY D/S <PF1> <PA2> <PF15> <PF22> <PF23> RETURN BWD 1ST PAGE PREV SUPL NEXT SUPL MSG: 07/26/17 Page 90 of 124 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031811
